actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Committee on Agriculture requested executive comment from Agriculture Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to provide price support for the 1986 through 1989 crops of sugar beets and sugarcane.

summary.text: Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949 authorize price supports for the 1986 through 1989 sugar beet and sugar cane crops. Sets sugar cane levels at: (1) $.185 per pound for 1986; (2) $.19 per pound for 1987; (3) $.195 per pound for 1988; and (4) $.20 per pound for 1989. Sets sugar beet prices at levels the Secretary of Agriculture determines to be reasonable in relation to sugar cane levels.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to provide price support for the 1986 through 1989 crops of sugar beets and sugarcane.
